titles.title: Town of North Topsail Beach Coastal Barrier Resources System Map Amendment Act of 2025
Town of North Topsail Beach Coastal Barrier Resources System Map Amendment Act of 2025
A bill to revise the boundaries of a unit of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System in Topsail, North Carolina, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
